access: Guests have access to the entire apartment!
description:
"Welcome to our chic 1-bedroom apartment in Chicago's West Loop neighborhood! This apartment is ideally sized for 1 or 2 travelers, but it is able to accommodate groups of 4. The location is amazing! You are in the heart of the West Loop neighborhood and walking distance to many restaurants, bars, and coffee shops. Plus, a train stop is less than 2 blocks away that quickly takes you to other parts of the city. The apartment is a third-floor walk up, well appointed and nicely decorated.

This one bedroom, one bathroom apartment is a third floor walk up that is ideal for 1 or 2 guests, but can accommodate groups of 4. The bedroom has a queen size bed and the bathroom has a walk in shower. The family room has a flat screen TV and a sofa that has a pullout bed. The kitchen is fully stocked with everything a chef needs to prepare a meal. Lastly, there is a washer and dryer in the apartment. The location of this apartment is fantastic! The Clinton train stop (Green and Pink lines) is less than two blocks from the apartment. The train is the easiest way to explore all of the best things Chicago has to offer!

Guests have access to the entire apartment!

We don't live on-site but we are always nearby to answer questions or give recommendations.

Chicago's West Loop neighborhood is one of the fastest growing parts of the city. It is home to millennials, baby boomers, professionals, students, and everything in between. There are plenty of coffee shops, restaurants, bars, and nightlife to choose from.

The Clinton train stop is less than 2 blocks away (2-3 minute walk). The Pink and Green lines are accessible at the Clinton stop. Uber/Lyft is available as well.

This apartment does not have parking, but we recommend using parking apps like SpotHero. We are near the train and provide a white noise sound machine to drown out any city/train noise. Lastly, this apartment is a third floor walk up and the building does not have an elevator.

cancelation_policies: [{'milestones': {'titles': ['Jan 11, 4:00PM', 'Check-in'], 'subtitles': [], 'type': 'check_in'}, 'localized_cancellation_policy_name': 'Super Strict 60 Days', 'cancellation_policy_label': 'super_strict_60', 'cancellation_policy_price_type': None, 'cancellation_policy_price_factor': 0.0, 'cancellation_policy_id': 9, 'book_it_module_tooltip': 'Cancel before 4:00PM on Jan 11 and only get a refund of the cleaning fee.', 'subtitle': 'Cancel before 4:00PM on Jan 11 and only get a refund of the cleaning fee.'}]

additional_house_rules:
All bookings require a security deposit of $250 or more. This deposit will not be charged in advance. 

For security purposes, we require all guests to provide an ID verification, license, or passport before check-in. 

Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds. 

Check-in time is any time after 4 P.M. Check-out time is any time before 11 a.m.

If an earlier check-in or a later check-out time is desired, then you can send us a request. However, this is not guaranteed. We do not allow smoking; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine. 

No parties, gatherings or events of any kind are allowed in the unit. 

Our locations do not allow pets. 

If a location is left in an exceptionally messy state, we will charge $25 for every extra hour of cleaning required. 

Guests take full responsibility for any accidents, injuries, or illnesses that occur while on the premises or its facilities. By accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use of the premises. 
Guests recognize that they may personally purchase insurance to protect themselves in such events. 

Lost or unreturned keys at the time of checkout will be charged a $50 per set.

If more guests sleep at a location than the number originally stated in the booking, the security deposit will be charged in full.

If you notice anything that presents a danger that could result in damage to the location or to any individuals, let us know immediately. 

If guests delay the cleaners from beginning their cleaning at the predetermined check-out time, guests will be charged $50. This fee is applied to any late checkout between 11 am and 1 pm. Any guest who is still in the location after 1 pm will be charged for an extra night. This does not apply if our team has approved a late checkout in advance. 

When you make a reservation with us, you are agreeing to all of the above House Rules. 

Shoes off, please.

description:
Escape to this modern hideaway in the heart of trendy Pilsen. Here, enjoy the comforts of a plush hotel with amenities like the Amazon Dot, Nespresso coffee maker, and concierge services. Chic galleries and gourmet cuisine are nearby.

Designed with the traveler in mind, this 2 Bedroom Stratus Suite (sleeps 6) caters to all your needs in a spacious layout with cool, natural decor that gives the Flora Suite a playful feel in a vibrant city. 

Stratus suites offer guests the comfort and style of a hotel without all the fuss. Complete with fresh furnishings and smart decor, each room is suited to the trendy traveler who craves comfort in new places. At the primary status level, the Stratus suite is ready to make you feel at home.

At a Glance

* Custom furnishings 
* Full and spacious kitchen
* Large flatscreen Smart TV
* Fast Internet 
*On the Art Walk
*Concierge services available from 9am to 10pm (central)

*Concierge services available from 9am to 10pm (central)

The apartment is in Pilsen, a cultural hub of attractions from The Art Walk and Thalia Hall to authentic ethnic restaurants. It's situated perfectly for travelers looking to experience Chicago while staying in one of its intimate communities.

Reserved parking available for an additional fee.

summary:
Light, bright, and cozy home in central Evanston. 3 full bedrooms & two bathrooms perfect for any family. Close to parks, beach, and in between Northwestern University, and Loyola University. Downtown evanston accessible from both public transit & by car. Beach 10 minute walk, very large deck & yard for the warm weather great patio furniture, fire pit, Bbq .
There is an apartment in the basement separate entrance for apartment , and the house

access: The bedroom and kitchen/dining room are accessible to all guests. Refrigerator and microwave access are available in the kitchen/dining room area.
description:
The house is a yellow townhouse with it's own separate gate and fence from the other homes in the area. The entrance is a metal gate facing the street, with a small path through a garden leading to the front door of the home. During the summer, the flowers we grow in the garden are beautiful!

One spacious bedroom can sleep two people in a double bed. There is a dresser with a mirror. Wash towels and amenities are in the dresser drawers.

The bedroom and kitchen/dining room are accessible to all guests. Refrigerator and microwave access are available in the kitchen/dining room area.

Guests are welcome to contact me or my husband via text messaging or calling our cell.

Right on the outskirts of Chinatown, only one block from the heart of Chinatown. There are numerous Chinese stores and authentic Chinese restaurants that cater to tourists within walking distance.
For any special needs, there is a Walgreen's right across the street.
1 mile from the McCormick Place convention center.
2 miles from Downtown Chicago/Grant Park.

Within walking distance to the Chinatown Redline subway station. The station itself is only one stop from the heart of Downtown Chicago going North, and one stop from Guaranteed Rate Field (White Sox Field) going south. The station is right above a very large public parking lot, and directly by the entrance/exit of several major highways, I-90/94 and I-55.

The room is on the second floor, and guests will have to use stairs to access the bedroom.

access: Private room for you, the shared spaces are living room, bathroom and kitchen.
description:
FREE Wi-Fi, Roku TV with Netflix and Hulu. Toiletries provided, clean towels, snack basket. FREE coffee and tea. Room has a small dorm fridge. In kitchen there's a microwave for guest use. Free street parking. There is a Walgreens 50 yards away and a Starbucks. An LA Fitness gym one block away. 7 minutes away from the Orange Line train station and only 12 minutes away from Midway Airport by Uber, Lyft or Taxi. $20 cleaning fees if you leave a big mess or dirty dishes

Secure apartment in quiet commercial/residential area. I have a security camera facing the front door in the living room and it will be recording when there is movement for security reasons of my guest and I. 

Original hardwood floors with lots of character. There's free street parking, either in front of building or the streets close to building. Public transportation near. Walgreens open 24 hours on same block.

Sleeping arrangements: There's a comfortable queen bed in room for two guest, I also have an air mattress you can inflate in room or in living room that fits one, and if there's a 4th guest there's a comfy sofa.

Private room for you, the shared spaces are living room, bathroom and kitchen.

Most of the time I will not be home or I'll be staying away from home but I'll be only a phone call away if you have questions or anything else you need. Respecting your privacy is essential to me.

This is a colorful diverse neighborhood located in the city's southwest side.

There's free street parking, either in front of building or the streets close to building. The orange line train is near by. I recommend Uber or Lyft because will be more convenient and faster.

-Check in is at 2pm- Flexible before of after that time but you need to communicate time of arrival in advance so I can arrange a smooth check-in

- Do the dishes after use if you leave dirty dishes a $20 cleaning fee will be charged to you. No smoking allowed in the apartment. If you stain the sheets a $20 fee will be charged also if you leave a big mess in the rooms a cleaning charge of $50 will be applied.  If you bring an unlisted guest a $100 charge will be added per extra person not listed in the original booking.

-Check out is at 11am but if you stay later than 11am without being acknowledge by me first, a $20 extra charge will be applied since this will delay my cleaning process to have the place ready for the next guest.

- If you lose or take the keys with you after check-out I will have to buy a new set of door knobs for the front entrance and the bedroom to replace them, also I will have to make extra sets of keys for me and the guest. The total it's $60 so please make sure you don't loose the keys.

-No extra charge for late check-in (acceptable as late as 1am)
Please communicate time of arrival as soon as you book or before.

- If you disconnect the security camera or the modem and the wireless router you'll be charged $500 for tampering with the security system.

access: You will have full access to the 2nd floor unit. Please do not access the roof or yard.
description:
Sunny and updated 2BR/1BA apartment in 2 unit brick building in Edgewater. Perfect location - 5 min to train downtown, 9 min walk to beach and Lakefront trail. Quiet street with easy access to grocery stores, shops and all Chicago attractions.

Now pet friendly for longer stays! Pets allowed subject to approval. Please message for details. $25 per night charge for each pet.

Second floor unit with hardwood floor throughout. Both bedrooms have comfortable queen size beds and huge closets. The kitchen is perfect for cooking and has a beautiful eat-in sun porch attached. Newly remodeled bathroom with great water pressure. 

We have a bookshelf of games for you to enjoy with your friends and family during your stay!

Kitchen has coffee maker, plates, bowls, utensils, pots, pans, cutting boards, etc.

Bathrooms have towels, shampoo, conditioner, body wash, soap, hair dryer, etc.

You will have full access to the 2nd floor unit. Please do not access the roof or yard.

I'm always available via message, phone, or text!

Edgewater is an excellent neighborhood. It's perfectly located close the beach, shops and restaurants on Broadway and Clark street, and public transportation for an easy trip to downtown Chicago attractions.

Close to Aragon, the Vic, and Riviera!

Easy access to all downtown Chicago theaters - Cadliac theater, Chicago theater, Oriental theater, Goodman theater, and Steppenwolf theater

1 minute to Lake Shore Drive
1 minute to many buses (Lake Shore bus, Clark bus)
5 minutes to Red Line train downtown
9 minute walk to beach / Lake Front trail

Parking on the street is free and easy

There is central air / heating

Easy walk to Loyola University and quick trip to Northwestern University!

We have security cameras outside of the building covering the front and back doors for extra security.
house_rules:
No yard access. 

No roof access. 

Pets allowed subject to approval. Message for details. Additional fee per pet for each night. Longer stays only. 

No indoor smoking.  $100 cleaning fee will be assessed if there is any evidence of smoking indoors!

Please be respectful of our neighbors and our property!
interaction: I'm always available via message, phone, or text!
neighborhood_overview:
Edgewater is an excellent neighborhood. It's perfectly located close the beach, shops and restaurants on Broadway and Clark street, and public transportation for an easy trip to downtown Chicago attractions.

Close to Aragon, the Vic, and Riviera!

Easy access to all downtown Chicago theaters - Cadliac theater, Chicago theater, Oriental theater, Goodman theater, and Steppenwolf theater
notes:
Parking on the street is free and easy

There is central air / heating

Easy walk to Loyola University and quick trip to Northwestern University!

We have security cameras outside of the building covering the front and back doors for extra security.
space:
Second floor unit with hardwood floor throughout. Both bedrooms have comfortable queen size beds and huge closets. The kitchen is perfect for cooking and has a beautiful eat-in sun porch attached. Newly remodeled bathroom with great water pressure. 

We have a bookshelf of games for you to enjoy with your friends and family during your stay!

Kitchen has coffee maker, plates, bowls, utensils, pots, pans, cutting boards, etc.

Bathrooms have towels, shampoo, conditioner, body wash, soap, hair dryer, etc.
summary:
Sunny and updated 2BR/1BA apartment in 2 unit brick building in Edgewater. Perfect location - 5 min to train downtown, 9 min walk to beach and Lakefront trail. Quiet street with easy access to grocery stores, shops and all Chicago attractions.

Now pet friendly for longer stays! Pets allowed subject to approval. Please message for details. $25 per night charge for each pet.
transit:
1 minute to Lake Shore Drive
1 minute to many buses (Lake Shore bus, Clark bus)
5 minutes to Red Line train downtown
9 minute walk to beach / Lake Front trail

description:
Modern Apartment in bustling Wicker Park / West Town

21% Discount for 7+ days.  Available all last week of March.

My place is still coming together, as I only make purchases that I'm in love with, and am letting it grow into itself.  The photos are mostly up to date although the second room desk has been swapped out for something more minimal.

I am pretty confident that anyone fond of modern design will enjoy it.  It has a decent sound system and plenty of space to relax in.  When I bought this space, it was the only one I actually saw in person.  Most Chicago condos have somewhat small living rooms, but mine is substantially bigger.  I knew it's what I wanted and went for it.

If you're reserving my entire apartment, I will not be around in person, but I am usually just a quick text away.

I am a quick walk away from Wicker Park, right about where Milwaukee starts to get interesting.  There is enough to do in that neighborhood to keep you busy for several days.  The Loop and Logan Square are quick train rides away, and Old Town, Lincoln Park, and Lakeview are quite easy to get to by bus or Uber.

I am 1000 feet from the Division Blue Line. It offers super easy access to and from O'Hare, as well as The Loop.

My girlfriend and I are now the proud parents of a pug.  He's quite a dandy guy.  We sweep and vacuum all the time, but that's not to mean it will be hair free.   Please keep this in mind when booking.

description:
Recharge after a day of play in Chicago. This cozy space includes an open concept kitchen, tons of natural light and greenery.
Located in the center of Lincoln Park you are steps away from one of a kind eating, unique shops, bars and nightlife. Get around the city with ease, we are two blocks from a divvy bike station, rail (“L”) train and bus stop.  Enjoy a morning bike ride or run through our historic neighborhood to Lake Michigan, or the Zoo, only 1.5 miles east.

Relax and enjoy our home, amenities include:
-Wifi
-Roku/Firestick
-Vintage charm exposed brick 
-Modern appliances (dishwasher, microwave, oven, toaster, coffee makers)
-Open floor plan
-High ceilings 

We love our space & neighborhood, we can't wait to share it with you!

Always available by cell phone. Please do not hesitate to text/call with any questions or concerns.

0.2 miles - Rail (‘L’) brown and purple lines
0.2 miles - Divvy bike share station
0.2 miles - CTA bus stop
2.2 miles - Wrigley Field

description:
This Condo has it's own private balcony overlooking a newly landscaped garden. Lively entertainment on the street! Lots of fun bars and restaurants to go see.

Easily walk to the 'L' at Fullerton, Whole Foods, The Lincoln Park Zoo, Oz Park, DePaul, and nearby nightlife! 9' ceilings, full bath with heated marble floor. Large open concept kitchen with island for dinning. Unit comes with 50" wall mounted TV for all your viewing needs. Private carpeted office in separate room. Oak Hardwood floors.

A quick jog to the beach! Also lots of nearby clothing and boutique stores along Halsted.

I am readily accessible for any questions and/or concerns you may have and will be located in the City nearby.

description:
Quiet Cozy Space with Private Entrance. LGBT and Pet Friendly. This one bedroom space has a living room with pull-out couch, 1gb WiFi, full kitchen, and laundry access. Less than a Mile to the CTA Red Line, and a bus that will leave you right at the train station in 5 minutes. 

Right at the edge of Roger's Park and Edgewater, our space is close to Loyola, near Evanston and Northwestern, and a short ride away from Wrigleyville and Boystown.

Located on a quiet friendly block with a huge backyard. This apartment is in the heart of Chicago's most diverse neighborhood. With the 155 CTA bus at the end of the block which goes directly to the CTA Redline, and 2 blocks to the Clark 22, 36, and 151 CTA buses most of which runs 24/7. These provide excellent shuttles to downtown Chicago.

This unit can sleep up 3-4 people, there's a Queen sized bed and a sofa  with a pull out mattress which can be set up in the living room if needed. 

An entire apartment with a full kitchen would allow you to cut the costs of ordering out. 

You also have access to a free washer and dryer, located in the basement common space (separate from the apartment)

Roger's Park is one of the most diverse neighborhoods in Chicago. Within a 5 minute walk, you have Thai and Sushi  restaurants, an All American Diner, Mexican Food, two gay bars, and a certified organic brewery. 

It's also a short walk (or even shorter bus ride) away from the Loyola University Campus and it's train stop.

Getting around from our location is easy on public transportation. We're a short walk away from Clark Street, and the 22 bus that goes all the way downtown. If you prefer to take the train, you can walk to the CTA Red line in 15 minutes (or take a bus that picks you up at our nearest corner). 

Of course, you can always call an uber or Lyft and take beautiful Lake Shore drive all the way to the loop.

We ask that you please tidy up after yourself. If there is an issue regarding a mess, a cleaning fee may be added.

access: Guests have their private bedroom, plus our shared CocaCola Kitchen, Living Room, and CTA bathroom. Also, the back porch is common space and you're welcome to enjoy our shared backyard.
description:
Join us in our crazy fun apartment centrally located in the North Center neighborhood of Chicago. Walking distance from the CTA train, bus routes, 24hrCVS, bar/restaurants, and Jewel. We are also just a short walk to Wrigley Field.

Decked out in Wizard of oz Collectibles, Disney Collectibles and a splash of Broadway memorabilia, this is a very comfortable bedroom with two awesome hosts.

Guests have their private bedroom, plus our shared CocaCola Kitchen, Living Room, and CTA bathroom. Also, the back porch is common space and you're welcome to enjoy our shared backyard.

Our neighborhood is GREAT. Very friendly people and lots of bars and restaurants and breweries nearby. We also have several parks and shopping as well. Great Brunch spots and some Chicago Favorites all within walking distance

We are nicely located so you can use public transportation to get everywhere. Short easy train ride to downtown. We also have pretty easy and free street parking in the neighborhood so parking is rarely a hassle.

We work from home so we are always available during your stay.

access: Guests will have access to the entire unit.
description:
This 3 Bedroom entire apartment located in beautiful Avondale in Chicago- which was recently recognized as one the nation’s 10 hottest, need-to-visit ‘hoods by popular travel website Lonely Planet-  is a perfect spot in which to visit the city! A short ride to Wrigley Field, with three major bus lines running steps away, and less than 3/4 of a mile to the CTA Blue Line trains, this place is situated in a great spot to take in all of Chicago! Great local nightlife and top-rated dining around!

3 bedrooms with an additional full sized futon in the front room- there is plenty of space to accommodate guests comfortably! Clean linens, fresh towels, hair dryer, iron and ironing board, and cooking pots/utensils are all supplied!

Guests will have access to the entire unit.

additional_house_rules:
REQUESTS:
1) Please treat the home with respect.
2) Please be courteous of others in building and neighbors. All socializing must be kept indoors after 9pm, and we request quiet time from 10pm-8am. 
3) The only guests allowed in the unit are those on the reservation. Special events will be considered on a case-by-case basis. 
4) We welcome children, but we are not child-proof. If you have specific questions/concerns, please ask before booking.
5) Absolutely no smoking inside - violations may result in a $500 smoke removal fee

CHECK IN/OUT: 
Standard check-in time is 4pm (or later). You will be sent written instructions and photos for entry. Standard check-out time is by 10am. If scheduling permits, we will work with you on alternate arrangements, so please inquire. If unit is not vacated by check-out time or notes are not followed, additional cleaning charges may apply.

For check out, I ask that you:
- turn off lights/TV and set heat to 55 / turn AC units off
- place used kitchen items in dishwasher and begun cycle
- bag any trash and dispose in bins behind building
- please place used towels in the bath tub; linens may be left as is 
- keys left inside the unit, lock door with keypad

description:
Welcome to Chicago! Enjoy a wonderful stay in this 3-BR/1-bath unit located on a serene, residential side street. The unit has everything you need to make your visit seamless and comfortable. Plus, it's in a prime location with easy access to Wrigley, Southport, parks/beaches, theaters, restaurants/bars, as well as multiple public transportation options.

UNIT
Enjoy a wonderful stay in this charming 3-BR/1-BA located on this serene, residential side street. It is on the 2nd story of a 3-story building. This unit has everything you need to make your visit seamless and comfortable. Unit features Chicago vintage charm with great natural lighting, built-in shelving, brand new granite counters in kitchen and bathroom, hardwood floors. Plus, it's in a prime location with easy access to Wrigley, Southport, parks/beaches, theaters, restaurants/bars, as well as multiple public transportation options. 

LIVING 15.5' x 11' Features decorative fireplace, Roku TV (guests log into own accounts, 1GBB wifi, over-sized chair and couch (non pull out).  

DINING 14' x 13.5' Features beautiful built-ins and dining table for 6. 

KITCHEN: 14' x 11.25' Features dishwasher, stove, coffee pot, basic cook ware, dining ware 

BEDROOM 1: 13' x 8' Features queen-sized bed, full-length mirror, and closet. Linens and towels included. Located off dining room

BEDROOM 2: 11.25' x 8' Features queen-sized bed and nightstand. Linens and towels included. Located off kitchen. 

BEDROOM 3: 6' x 8' features twin bed, small table and mirror. Linens and towels included. Located off living room. 

BATHROOM 1: Located off hallway, the bathroom features a shower/tub and brand new granite vanity.

You will have the entire unit to yourself: 3 bedrooms, kitchen, dining room, living room, and 1 bathroom. You also have access to the building's laundry room, which is located in the basement and shared by 3 units. Machines cost $1.50 each and take quarters.

My goal is to ensure you have the most enjoyable and comfortable stay in Chicago. I have a detailed guest guidebook (emailed in advance and printed in unit) that includes info about the apt, neighborhood, and city to help maximize your time in the city. If you'd like additional assistance with anything, I'm more than happy to help! Depending on my work travel schedule, I may or may not be in town; however, I'm always accessible via phone or email for any questions that arise.

The Lakeview neighborhood and Wrigleyville / Boystown areas have so much within walking distance, you won't want to leave! There are numerous bakeries, boutique stores, theaters, and lively bars and restaurants. If you do feel like venturing out of the neighborhood, Lakeview is very centrally located. Head south to visit Lincoln Park, River North, and the Loop, or west to visit Buck Town or Logan square. Both public transit and Uber/Lyft are great ways to get around.

PARKING
Free, public street parking is available in the area. Some streets require a permit, and others do not. We offer permits at the unit for a small fee. Please note you may have to circle the block a few times to find a spot. If you prefer paid parking with a designated spot, I recommend using Spot-Hero to find nearby options that work for you.

Once you're here, public transportation and/or Uber are the easiest ways to get around the city.

CLOSEST STOPS
o Addison red train: .3 mi, trains go uptown/downtown
o Belmont purple/brown train stop: .6 mi, trains go uptown/downtown
o 77, 8, 36 bus and more to go up/downtown or east/west

Stations all have machines that sell Ventra passes (name of provider). You can also purchase Ventra cards at Walgreens. You can either purchase a single ride ticket, a re-loadable Ventra card, or an unlimited pass (1, 3, or 7 days). Multiple people may share a re-loadable card and fares will be deducted for each person; however, the unlimited passes can not be shared

COURTESY
We request noise be kept to a reasonable level from 10pm-8am.

ENTRY
Check-in is at 4pm or later and check-out is by 10am. We provide detailed check-in notes with photos.

PACK N PLAY
Pack N Play may be rented for $5/night. It will be inside the unit waiting for you in its carrying case, and we request you fold it up back into its carrying case prior to departure. Note that linens are not included for the crib.

30+ DAY STAYS
The unit will be fully cleaned and stocked with paper / bathroom products for your arrival. After these initial products, monthly guests are responsible for providing their own bathroom products and paper products. For 30+ day stays, we also include a monthly complimentary cleaning.
house_rules:
REQUESTS:
1) Please treat the home with respect.
2) Please be courteous of others in building and neighbors. All socializing must be kept indoors after 9pm, and we request quiet time from 10pm-8am. 
3) The only guests allowed in the unit are those on the reservation. Special events will be considered on a case-by-case basis. 
4) We welcome children, but we are not child-proof. If you have specific questions/concerns, please ask before booking.
5) Absolutely no smoking inside - violations may result in a $500 smoke removal fee

CHECK IN/OUT: 
Standard check-in time is 4pm (or later). You will be sent written instructions and photos for entry. Standard check-out time is by 10am. If scheduling permits, we will work with you on alternate arrangements, so please inquire. If unit is not vacated by check-out time or notes are not followed, additional cleaning charges may apply.

For check out, I ask that you:
- turn off lights/TV and set heat to 55 / turn AC units off
- place used kitchen items in dishwasher and begun cycle
- bag any trash and dispose in bins behind building
- please place used towels in the bath tub; linens may be left as is 
- keys left inside the unit, lock door with keypad

If you'd like additional assistance with anything, I'm more than happy to help! Depending on my work travel schedule, I may or may not be in town; however, I'm always accessible via phone or email for any questions that arise.

access: You’ll have your very own balcony with a small table and two chairs overlooking our garden. The entire apartment is yours. There won’t be any spaces to share.
description:
This is the top floor of our home in Wicker Park. You have your own entrance, own bathroom, and mini fridge. (No full kitchen). It is connected to our space, but we won't share any rooms. 

We are still adding amenities and photos. (A small couch, fridge, etc.)

The bedroom is bright and has a bed a Casper mattress.

You have a private patio with a view of the large Catalpa tree in our backyard.

When you're outside you can hear the L go by, but once you're inside you don't notice it.

To access the apartment, you have to go up an exterior spiral staircase--2 floors! The view is spectacular, but if you're very sensitive to heights it might not be the right place for you.

You’ll have your very own balcony with a small table and two chairs overlooking our garden. The entire apartment is yours. There won’t be any spaces to share.

We are generally available any day after about noon.

We are located between two major streets that have tons of restaurants, cafes, bars, etc.

We are close to both the Damen and Division stop on the blue line--also the buses on Milwaukee and Division. Lyfts and Ubers are easy to come by. Also it's an easy walk over to Logan Square, Bucktown, Ukranian Village, etc.

description:
Enjoy city living in this beautiful home in Old Town. This house comes with 3 levels of living space with a large master suite and tons of closet space, vaulted ceilings, living room and formal dining room with expansive Kitchen with abundant counter space and french doors leading to deck with private back yard. It also has a laundry room. You will enjoy all the restaurants, shopping and public transportation right at your fingertips.

MULTIPLE PARKING SPOTS AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST

The house is in the heart of old town and is in walking distance to many restaurants and public transportation.

PARKING AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST. MULTIPLE SPOTS - Please inquire before booking if needed.

I will greet you at the house during check in or send you a code via message to let you in the house. I live in the area so if you have any questions, problems or simply need recommendations for dinner, please don't hesitate to call.

Old Town is a little more than a mile north of downtown Chicago.  This historic neighborhood is unlike any other in Chicago with its many tiny streets, Victorian-era buildings, shops, and hidden gardens. Originally a collection of farm fields just west of Lake Michigan, Old Town has had many incarnations through the years including being a so-called ‘hippie haven’ in the 1960s with trendy boutiques, restaurants and folk music venues like the Earl of Old Town and the Old Town School of Folk Music.  Of course, Old Town is also home to The Second City, the world famous improv comedy theater, which also opened back in those counter-culture days. Tree-lined Wells Street features old-school pubs, charming eateries and artisanal coffee shops, as well as quirky boutiques.

Brown line sedgwick stop is in walking distance.

access: Guests also have access to the gym in the property as well!
description:
Enjoy scenic city views in this 3 bedroom/ 2 Bath apartment in the West Town area of Chicago. This space comes with modern amenities such as a lounge area and fitness center. There are also restaurants and bars just about 10 min walk. Here you’ll find all the comforts of home: full kitchen, custom artwork, and furnishings curated to reflect the beauty of the Windy City. Come stay with us at this beautiful Domio and experience the best that Chicago has to offer.

This space exemplifies the Domio standard: uncompromising style and maximum comfort. This 3 bedroom and 2 bath apartment boasts a spacious living room, premium furniture, and high-end finishes. Two bedrooms have a queen size bed and the third bedroom has a full size bed. In the living room, there is a an air mattress for added comfort.

Guests also have access to the gym in the property as well!

We do our best to tailor each experience to our guests preferences. Want advice, suggestions, or a shoulder to lean on? We are always available at your disposal. Need a place to stay but don't feel like chatting? That's okay too, we won't be offended.

River West is one of Chicago's best neighborhoods of being close to the loop, yet far enough from all the hustle and bustle. Easily walk to bars or restaurants that call River West their home.

Chicago Registration Number: R19000040424

Please note that we do not allow bookings from residents of Chicago and surrounding areas.

access: You'll have access to the entire private unit as well as a private yard and patio in the rear.
description:
Located in hip Logan Square & central to everything to do in the city. A true melting pot neighborhood. Steps from trendy breweries, restaurants, bars & boutiques along amazing Milwaukee Ave. Ethnic fare offers up every type of cuisine you can imagine. The food scene in Chicago is amazing.  East to Wrigley Field and beautiful beaches, South to Downtown, North to Chicago's North Shore,outlet malls,  River Casino and more!!

A brand new 2 story duplex gut rehabbed in 2018. Fully furnished and perfect for family or friends. Master suite with a private bathroom. 2 additional bedrooms, family room and a sofa in the living room provide lots of sleeping options.  There's lots of room to roam and stretch out.

You'll have full use of the entire space as well as a private yard and patio if you want to spend some time outdoors during your stay.

You'll have access to the entire private unit as well as a private yard and patio in the rear.

Although we don't live on the property we're nearby should our guests need us.  Only a phone call away.

Logan square is one of the hottest areas in Chicago.  Truly diverse and a melting pot of cultures and languages.  Safe, lively and friendly.  You'll love the energy of the neighborhood.

Public transportation is available at the corner for city buses and a short walk from the Blue Line Train.  Divvy bikes are available at the nearby 6 corner intersection of Milwaukee, Kimball and Diversey. Uber and Lyft are a constant in the neighborhood.

Lockbox located  at  apartment front door.

space:
A brand new 2 story duplex gut rehabbed in 2018. Fully furnished and perfect for family or friends. Master suite with a private bathroom. 2 additional bedrooms, family room and a sofa in the living room provide lots of sleeping options.  There's lots of room to roam and stretch out.

You'll have full use of the entire space as well as a private yard and patio if you want to spend some time outdoors during your stay.
summary: Located in hip Logan Square & central to everything to do in the city. A true melting pot neighborhood. Steps from trendy breweries, restaurants, bars & boutiques along amazing Milwaukee Ave. Ethnic fare offers up every type of cuisine you can imagine. The food scene in Chicago is amazing.  East to Wrigley Field and beautiful beaches, South to Downtown, North to Chicago's North Shore,outlet malls,  River Casino and more!!
transit: Public transportation is available at the corner for city buses and a short walk from the Blue Line Train.  Divvy bikes are available at the nearby 6 corner intersection of Milwaukee, Kimball and Diversey. Uber and Lyft are a constant in the neighborhood.

access: The entire bottom floor is yours with access to the backyard as part of your booking.
description:
A beautiful, garden unit condo in a 3 story house to rent!  Newly constructed bathroom, appliances and cabinets.  You'll surely enjoy your stay in this beautiful, pet free home with outdoor patio and yard.!

Free street parking is most available during the day. 

Comes with all the necessary accommodations to make sure your family/group has an enjoyable stay.

Modern Aesthetic, classic comfort.

The entire bottom floor is yours with access to the backyard as part of your booking.

The neighborhood is wonderful.  Right in Ukrainian Village and very close to Wicker Park.  There are great restaurants and bars nearby. There is a 3 ring binder on the kitchen table with menus from local restaurants, house rules and information.

Street parking is most available during the day.  We suggest that if you have a car that you part it and Uber or Lyft around town. 
There is a 66 bus nearby that'll take you all the way to Navy Pier or to the L train to go downtown.

FYI - For your safety and protection, there are 2 cameras only on the outside of the home.  One is on the window facing the front door, the other is on the side of the house monitoring the back entrance of the home.  We value your privacy, there are no cameras inside the home.

access: Guests have access to the building's fitness center and indoor pool.
description:
This space will be the highlight of your Chicago trip! Enjoy this 3 bedroom/3 bath space apartment close to Navy Pier. This space comes with modern amenities such as a rooftop lounge area and fitness center. Here you’ll find all the comforts of home: full kitchen, custom artwork, and furnishings curated to reflect the beauty of the Windy City.

This space exemplifies the Domio standard: uncompromising style and maximum comfort. This 3 bedroom and 3 bath apartment boasts a radiant living room, exquisite furniture, and premium finishes. In addition to a fully-stocked kitchen with professional-grade appliances, guests will be pleased to find hand-picked artwork throughout the home. Each bedroom has a queen size bed.

Guests have access to the building's fitness center and indoor pool.

There’s no need for us to get in your way of having a good time. If you need anything though - questions, recommendations, or just want to chat - our Domio delighters are always one phone call away!

Streeterville is one of Chicago's most walkable neighborhoods and you'll be steps from the famed Navy Pier which is a short walk away. Easily walk to restaurants and bars to truly experience Chicago.

Chicago Registration Number: Pending

additional_house_rules:
Presence of more than 14 people at the property is UNLAWFUL.
City of Chicago requires hosts to identify all guests. Each guest will need to present ID at check in and copy will be made. For one night reservations the entire group needs to be present in order to check in.
Smoking is not allowed anywhere on my property, inside or out. $500 fee will be charged from security deposit if any smoking takes place. 
This is a neighborhood residential street. All noise needs to remain inside the unit and quite hours observed.
Absolutely no illegal activity will be tolerated. If these rules are not observed, authorities will be notified immediately.

access: You will be able to utilize these entire two floors, one parking space, back yard (backyard maybe shared with long term tenants downstairs however you will have your own designated furniture and grill).
description:
Rent with confidence from Superhost with 300+ five star feedbacks for other properties.
Walk to all the action of Wicker park- restaurants, bars and shops; take a 15 min train ride to Downtown or explore 606 from this amazing 5 bedroom home. 
Bachelor and bachelorette groups, families with kids and all young at heart will love the arcade machine! No tokens needed! 
This amazing space has 5 bedrooms, separate living and dining rooms, huge backyard, parking space, breakfast and more! Pets welcome!

This light filled home spans over 2 floors. 
First floor: formal living room, dining room and spacious kitchen. There is a generous front foyer, open deck with seating in front and enclosed sun deck off the kitchen in the back- plenty of space for a bigger group to spread out or celebrate together! The two full bathrooms are on this level as well as two of the bedrooms. Please note that one bedroom has no window. 

Second floor has three bedrooms. No bathrooms on this floor. Laundry room is on the lower level. 

SLEEPING ARRANGEMENTS:
Bedroom 1 (second floor): 2 queen size beds
Bedroom 2 (second floor): 2 queen size beds
Bedroom 3 (second floor): 1 queen size bed
Bedroom 4 (first floor): 1 small double futon
Bedroom 5 (first floor): 1 small double futon
Living room (first floor): 1 double futon.
I provide linens, towels, bath supplies.
Note about the house: It is an older home. We scrub it clean between guests but there are many layers of paint, floors are not brand new and kitchen is a bit dated. It is taken care of with love.

BREAKFAST
By your arrival time the fridge and pantry will be stocked with the selection of the following  (for longer stays fresh items will be replenished):
yogurt
bread
butter
jam
oatmeal
eggs
fresh fruit
juice
2% milk
Please note that I do not prepare, serve or clean up.

OTHER AMENITIES:

You will be able to utilize these entire two floors, one parking space, back yard (backyard maybe shared with long term tenants downstairs however you will have your own designated furniture and grill).

I have a Superhost status on Airbnb. You can book my property with confidence knowing so many before you truly enjoy their stay and left five star feedback. You can be assured that all amenities will be as described and I am always around to help with anything needed.

Hip Wicker Park has been a residential enclave since Chicago was incorporated as a city in 1837. North Milwaukee Avenue is known for its bustling nightlife, dining and entertainment venues, with Subterranean and Davenport’s setting the bar for the city's trendy music clubs. North Damen Avenue draws hip crowds with its quirky shops, minimalist cafes, specialty grocery stores and cool fashion boutiques.
The Bloomingdale Line was a 2.7-mile (4.3 km) elevated railroad running east-west on the northwest side of Chicago. In 2015, the City of Chicago converted it into an elevated greenway called The Bloomingdale Trail, which forms the backbone of the linear park and trail network called The 606.

Two blue line stops within walking distance. It is a direct line to the O’Hare airport and downtown. You get one parking space with your reservation. If you have additional cars, there is Spothero parking nearby and I can text you a coupon for it.

IF YOU ARE PLANNING ON HAVING A CELEBRATION: Unregistered guests are not allowed on the property.  Presence of more than 14 guests is unlawful. A guest is anyone at the property, staying the night or just visiting. There is a counter installed and police will be notified immediately. This is not a place for a local house party. 

CONSIDER PURCHASING MY WORRY FREE CLEANING PACKAGE: For those of you traveling to Chicago to celebrate together: for additional $100 you do not have to clean anything. Just walk out in the morning (you do need to move furniture back if you make any changes to lay out). Note that this fee is additional to my regular cleaning fee.
house_rules:
Presence of more than 14 people at the property is UNLAWFUL.
City of Chicago requires hosts to identify all guests. Each guest will need to present ID at check in and copy will be made. For one night reservations the entire group needs to be present in order to check in.
Smoking is not allowed anywhere on my property, inside or out. $500 fee will be charged from security deposit if any smoking takes place. 
This is a neighborhood residential street. All noise needs to remain inside the unit and quite hours observed.
Absolutely no illegal activity will be tolerated. If these rules are not observed, authorities will be notified immediately.
interaction: I have a Superhost status on Airbnb. You can book my property with confidence knowing so many before you truly enjoy their stay and left five star feedback. You can be assured that all amenities will be as described and I am always around to help with anything needed.

space:
This light filled home spans over 2 floors. 
First floor: formal living room, dining room and spacious kitchen. There is a generous front foyer, open deck with seating in front and enclosed sun deck off the kitchen in the back- plenty of space for a bigger group to spread out or celebrate together! The two full bathrooms are on this level as well as two of the bedrooms. Please note that one bedroom has no window. 

Second floor has three bedrooms. No bathrooms on this floor. Laundry room is on the lower level. 

SLEEPING ARRANGEMENTS:
Bedroom 1 (second floor): 2 queen size beds
Bedroom 2 (second floor): 2 queen size beds
Bedroom 3 (second floor): 1 queen size bed
Bedroom 4 (first floor): 1 small double futon
Bedroom 5 (first floor): 1 small double futon
Living room (first floor): 1 double futon.
I provide linens, towels, bath supplies.
Note about the house: It is an older home. We scrub it clean between guests but there are many layers of paint, floors are not brand new and kitchen is a bit dated. It is taken care of with love.

BREAKFAST
By your arrival time the fridge and pantry will be stocked with the selection of the following  (for longer stays fresh items will be replenished):
yogurt
bread
butter
jam
oatmeal
eggs
fresh fruit
juice
2% milk
Please note that I do not prepare, serve or clean up.

OTHER AMENITIES:
summary:
Rent with confidence from Superhost with 300+ five star feedbacks for other properties.
Walk to all the action of Wicker park- restaurants, bars and shops; take a 15 min train ride to Downtown or explore 606 from this amazing 5 bedroom home. 
Bachelor and bachelorette groups, families with kids and all young at heart will love the arcade machine! No tokens needed! 
This amazing space has 5 bedrooms, separate living and dining rooms, huge backyard, parking space, breakfast and more! Pets welcome!

access: Parking (and free 24 hour passes), CTA train, walking to many places and amenities.  Laundry (free) in basement.
description:
This is a house size apartment in a prime location in Logan Square, spacious and nicely furnished with just what you need, no more.  Families and travelers from around the world have stayed here.  Available for longer stays (min one month) in 2018.  The den can be converted to a bedroom, we have hosted groups up to six people.  Very convenient for travelers, short walk to Blue Line Train (O'Hare and Downtown).  Our unit is ready to move in and enjoy Chicago.  Great for families.

Logan Square is a "hot" neighborhood in Chicago - lots of young people, new business and entertainment, excellent transportation central to CTA train, major highways, bike routes, and airport.  This apartment is ideal for a couple or family, short term stay or transition move.  Our unit is on one of the nicest blocks, with quiet "residential neighborhood" vibe but very short walk to cool coffee shops, boutique grocers and wine shop, top notch restaurants including Longman and Eagle, Buona Terra, Quiote, Lula Cafe, bars, farmers market, and train to downtown.  It is a first floor unit in a classic Chicago Greystone with spacious living and dining rooms, den/office, entry way, two bedrooms, and spare closets.  Master bedroom has large closet, back bedroom is comfortable but no closet. Kitchen is modern style with good lighting, morning sun, marble "look" island, wood cabinets, and modern appliances, well equipped for people who like to cook.  Appealing back porch and nice backyard with patio and garden. Easy street parking, close to California and Logan Square Blue Line, very close access to 90/94, and all restaurants/amenities of Logan Square. Free laundry in basement, and we could make storage space if required. Wifi included.  Family friendly block with good schools and neighbors, lots of kids. Freshly painted and cleaned, new Pella windows.  Apartment furnished in clean, vintage modern style.  Beds for four, we have a Coleman queen mattress for extra people (additional small per person charge above four guests, six people max).  In 2018 we are hosting longer stays only, and have rented for up to several months.

Parking (and free 24 hour passes), CTA train, walking to many places and amenities.  Laundry (free) in basement.

As little or much as required to make sure everything is OK.

Spacious but bustling urban neighborhood in a great city.  Surprisingly easy to park.  There are city rental bikes ("Divvy" bikes) only a half block away on Altgeld, next to Quiote Restaurant.  Its a three block walk to the train, and we are less than half mile from a second train stop as well.

Ideal for location and transportation.  Car:  about three blocks from Interstate 90/94. Train:  close to two Blue Line stops.   Bike:  lots of dedicated bike lanes, lots of bicyclists, about 25 minutes to downtown.   On foot:  Great neighborhood for walking and running.   Plane:  short trip to O'Hare airport.  Neighborhood is very convenient for travelers.

We may consider a pet if it is a transition in housing.

access: Private room just for you. Spacious living room shared with two college students. Clean bathroom shared with one other. Kitchen perfect for cooking a meal from the Trader Joe's around the corner (5 minutes away walking). Everything is fully furnished... come ready to relax!
description:
Plan a visit to Hyde Park and the University of Chicago and stay in a lovely, comfortable room. Offer includes a private room in an apartment, along with a living room shared with 2 male University of Chicago undergraduates. Only a block away from the center of Hyde Park and minutes walking to the University. Book now to enjoy a pleasant stay soon!

Private room just for you. Spacious living room shared with two college students. Clean bathroom shared with one other. Kitchen perfect for cooking a meal from the Trader Joe's around the corner (5 minutes away walking). Everything is fully furnished... come ready to relax!

I will be away, but if you have any questions or concerns during your stay, please feel free to ask my apartment-mates.

Humble neighborhood perfectly placed in the middle of Hyde Park. Nearby you'll find a grocery store (Trader Joe's), a Walgreens, plenty of restaurants, and a sweet coffee shop perfect to fuel up for the day.

There are CTA bus stops just a block away that can take you downtown, East, and West. Also the Metra train stop is 6 minutes walking (takes you all the way to Millenium Park).

access:
Entire apartment and everything it has to offer. 
The kitchen equipped with: Microwave, refrigerator, toaster, coffee maker, stove, oven, kitchen utensils.
Laundry located in unit
Wi-Fi high-speed internet, LCD TV, Netflix
King size bed, blanket, pillows, soft bed linens
Bathroom amenities: extra large towels, shampoo, conditioner, body soap.
Air conditioning and heating in all area
Table to have your meals or work
Free access to pool and gym available at the building.
description:
Downtown gorgeous studio located steps from the Art Institute of Chicago, Museum of Modern Art, and beautiful Millennium Park. Restaurants, bars, cafes, shopping, theaters, nightlife, entertainment - you are in the heart of it all. Enjoy a show at one of six area theaters, or take a walk to the Millennium Park, just a 11 minutes walk distance from the apartment. Enjoy the amenities while visiting one of the best location in Chicago: we offer NETFLIX for our guests.

This beautiful studio is in the heart of the city and the privileged location give this space a truly unique feel. Guests have the entire apartment to themselves. The room is a studio unit with full bathroom/full kitchen, both separate from the main room. 
The home is central to everything with many bars, restaurants, venues and nightclubs within a 2 block radius of the building.
Thank you for considering to stay at our home and we look forward to having you!!!

Table to have your meals or work
Free access to pool and gym available at the building.

We are always available, please contact at anytime, always happy to accommodate.

Prior to Check In Guest will receive all instructions for accessing the home, which will be entire your during your stay!
If you need, request an extra bed and we will provide.

access: You have the whole apartment to yourself, but I am right upstairs if you need anything.
description:
Beautiful garden apartment in owner-occupied home on one of the prettiest blocks in Ukrainian Village.  You have the full apartment, including bedroom with full-sized bed, comfortable living room and dining area, a desk to work at, and a kitchenette perfect for making breakfast or snacks.

You have the whole apartment to yourself, but I am right upstairs if you need anything.

I’d love to chat with you while you are here.  I love giving advice on what to do in Chicago. If you hear me upstairs, feel free to stop up.  The best way is by coming outside to the back door.  Or just text me and I can stop down!

This is one of the hippest neighborhoods in the city.  There are tons of bars and restaurants within blocks.  I have some suggestions available in the apartment.

I am an easy walk from the Blue line — either the Damen or Division stop, depending on where you are coming from. If you drive, parking is not too bad.  My block doesn’t require a permit, and if you arrive during the day, there are almost always spaces. If you arrive after 6:00 pm, you might have to park a block or so away.

access: The listing is for the entire apartment.
description:
Sunny and charming 2BR apt in historic 
Ukrainian Village (West Town). Vintage apt. with modern amenities: dishwasher, washer/dryer, Wi-Fi, smart TV, cable, central heat/AC. Easy & free street parking. Top floor of 3 floor walkup. Feels like home!

Great central location. Walk to great bars & restaurants. Close to highways & public transportation. 3 miles to downtown. 2 mi to heart of Wicker Park. 3 mi to the Mag Mile, Logan Square, Lincoln Park. 5 mi to Wrigley. Cheap Uber/Lyft rides!

Darling vintage apartment with great sunlight. Free and easy street parking is so rare in Chicago, we’ve got it right on Western Ave. Not the fanciest place but it has lots of charm, it’s affordable, comfortable and in a great central location. GREAT option for long term rentals and business professionals!

The listing is for the entire apartment.

Happy to answer questions via text or through the app. We are very quick to respond.

Easy street parking, no permit or meters. Cheap uber/Lyft rides to downtown!

We have a full coffee and tea bar! Regular coffee maker, keurig, french press, tea kettle and assortment!
interaction: Happy to answer questions via text or through the app. We are very quick to respond.
notes: We have a full coffee and tea bar! Regular coffee maker, keurig, french press, tea kettle and assortment!

access:
Wifi accessible
Smart TV available with Netflix, Amazon Prime, Pandora etc. 
Basic cable channels.
description:
Newly renovated condominium in trendy Avondale neighborhood in Chicago fully furnished! Nice quiet neighborhood but still only minutes to Downtown and plenty of restaurants, lounges, breweries and parks! Logan Square and Wicker Park neighborhoods 5-10 minutes away!

Spacious updated kitchen with range/oven and dishwasher.

There is a queen size bed in the bedroom that sleeps 2 comfortably

Living room with fireplace and sofa with power recliner on both ends.

Second bedroom was converted to dining room that comes off the kitchen. Dining room is also a great spot to get things done for work (lots of sunlight).

Balcony off living room with plenty of outdoor furniture and lights. Overlooks the lower courtyard

In Unit washer and Dryer

Keypad entry through outside gate and for condo door as well. (No keys needed)

This condo is my primary residence so please treat it as your own!

Wifi accessible
Smart TV available with Netflix, Amazon Prime, Pandora etc. 
Basic cable channels.

I'm available via call/text to help with any questions during your stay and can provide a list of restaurants/activities for your interest.

The neighborhood is safe and friendly with parks, cafe's, restaurants and breweries located minutes away. Target is conveniently located across the street. Condo is 2 miles directly west from the Cubs Stadium, Wrigley Field! 15 minute drive to downtown (depending on traffic). Lots of fun and trendy nearby neighborhoods such as Roscoe Village, Logan square, and Wicker Park.

Uber/Lyft shared ride service usually available within 2 minutes. Divvy bike rental 9 minute walk away. 5 minutes to Kennedy Expressway (90/94). Public CTA bus located right outside building. 10 minute walk to the Addison CTA train strop. If you need any help navigating the public transit I am more than happy to send instructions!

This is my primary residence, so please treat it as you would your own! 
Property is gated with security code for entrance.
No parties and no pets allowed.
No Smoking.
house_rules: This is my primary residence of living. Please respect the home as if it were your own :) The floors are newly done so please refrain from wearing  shoes (especially heels) around the inside.
interaction: I'm available via call/text to help with any questions during your stay and can provide a list of restaurants/activities for your interest.
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is safe and friendly with parks, cafe's, restaurants and breweries located minutes away. Target is conveniently located across the street. Condo is 2 miles directly west from the Cubs Stadium, Wrigley Field! 15 minute drive to downtown (depending on traffic). Lots of fun and trendy nearby neighborhoods such as Roscoe Village, Logan square, and Wicker Park.
notes:
This is my primary residence, so please treat it as you would your own! 
Property is gated with security code for entrance.
No parties and no pets allowed.
No Smoking.
space:
Spacious updated kitchen with range/oven and dishwasher.

There is a queen size bed in the bedroom that sleeps 2 comfortably

Living room with fireplace and sofa with power recliner on both ends.

Second bedroom was converted to dining room that comes off the kitchen. Dining room is also a great spot to get things done for work (lots of sunlight).

Balcony off living room with plenty of outdoor furniture and lights. Overlooks the lower courtyard

In Unit washer and Dryer

Keypad entry through outside gate and for condo door as well. (No keys needed)

This condo is my primary residence so please treat it as your own!
summary: Newly renovated condominium in trendy Avondale neighborhood in Chicago fully furnished! Nice quiet neighborhood but still only minutes to Downtown and plenty of restaurants, lounges, breweries and parks! Logan Square and Wicker Park neighborhoods 5-10 minutes away!
transit: Uber/Lyft shared ride service usually available within 2 minutes. Divvy bike rental 9 minute walk away. 5 minutes to Kennedy Expressway (90/94). Public CTA bus located right outside building. 10 minute walk to the Addison CTA train strop. If you need any help navigating the public transit I am more than happy to send instructions!

additional_house_rules:
All bookings require a security deposit of $500 or more. This deposit will not be charged in advance.

Kindly note that the special reduction in Cleaning Fees is only for the Winter Season hence the regular Cleaning fees of USD 135 will be applicable for all arrivals on or after 01 March, 2019 on wards.

For security purposes, we require all guests to provide an ID verification, license, or passport before check-in. 

Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds. 

Check-in time is any time after 4 P.M. Check-out time is any time before 11 a.m. If an earlier check-in or a later check-out time is desired, then you can send us a request. However, this is not guaranteed. We do not allow smoking; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine. 

Our locations do not allow pets. 

No parties, gatherings or events of any kind are allowed in the unit. 

If a location is left in an exceptionally messy state, we will charge $75 for every extra hour of cleaning required. 

Guests take full responsibility for any accidents, injuries, or illnesses that occur while on the premises or its facilities. By accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use of the premises. Guests recognize that they may personally purchase insurance to protect themselves in such events. 

 Lost or unreturned keys will result in an additional $100 fee (per set).

If more guests sleep at a location than the number originally stated in the booking, the security deposit will be charged in full. 

We may ask to hold in advance a damage/security deposit for last minute reservations or local stays.

If you notice anything that presents a danger that could result in damage to the location or to any individuals, let us know immediately. 

If guests delay the cleaners from beginning their cleaning at the predetermined check-out time, guests will be charged $100. This fee is applied to any late checkout between 11 am and 1 pm. Any guest who is still in the location after 1 pm will be charged for an extra night. This does not apply if our team has approved a late checkout in advance. 

When you make a reservation with us, you are agreeing to all of the above House Rules.

Shoes off, please.

neighborhood_overview: This apartment is conveniently located within walking distance of McCormick Place and a short drive to all tourist attractions, including the Field Museum, Shedd Aquarium, and the famous Chicago bean (Cloud Gate) sculpture.
space:
Designed with the traveler in mind, this Cirro Suite provides a lavish spread of luxurious amenities in a spacious layout. Featuring two master bedrooms and ambient decor, the Parker Suite is ready to be your modern oasis above the beautiful Chicago skyline!

Cirro suites offer a unique experience that caters to tranquility and comfort and are tailored to meet the needs of each visitor. Each bedroom awaits to enfold you with soft, white linens, a memory foam mattress, and plush guest robes. Each bathroom is ready to cleanse you with organic soaps and Turkish cotton towels. The highest of three status levels, Cirro suites gives you the exquisite Chicago experience you deserve.

At a Glance

* Luxury white cotton linens (sheets, robes, towels) 
* Puracy™ organic bath and body products
* Salon professional-grade hair dryer
* Two 55-inch 4K TV’s and sound bars (living room and bedroom)
* High-speed WiFi 
* Amazon Echo
* Electronic safe
* Nespresso coffee maker w/ Nespresso pods
*Indoor parking option available (additional fee)
*Concierge services available from 9am to 10pm (central)

access: In addition to your room, you'll have shared access to the kitchen, living room, and bathroom.
description:
This is a private room in a three-bedroom apartment. Restaurants, shops, and bars are all within walking distance. Downtown is a 12-minute train ride away via the adjacent Armitage Brown Line station.

Trove guests have exclusive FREE access to The Metropolitan, a members-only club located on the 66th and 67th floors of the Willis Tower. Check "Exclusive Trove Perks" in the listing description for details.

Thanks so much for your interest in staying with us! We ask that you read through our entire listing to make sure that we're the right hosts for you.

PLEASE NOTE

This room is adjacent to the "L" train tracks. This means you will hear train noise regularly in the apartment and your room. 

THIS TROVE HAS

✔ Queen-size bed
✔ Turkish cotton bath and hand towels
✔ 46" HDTV w/ Netflix (no cable TV)
✔ Keurig coffee maker
✔ Body wash and shampoo
✔ Iron and ironing board
✔ Hair dryer
✔ Keyless Entry

--and more!

EXCLUSIVE TROVE PERKS

During your stay as a Trove guest, you receive a free membership to The Metropolitan, a members-only club and co-working space located on the 66th and 67th floors of the Willis Tower (for reservations <14 days).  Included with your membership:

✔ Upscale co-working space, dining, and bars
✔ Stunning views of Chicago and Lake Michigan
✔ Discounted express tickets to the Willis Tower Skydeck

Message us for more details!

HAVE A QUESTION?

Check out the “Other Things to Note” section of this listing for the answers to our most frequently asked questions.

In addition to your room, you'll have shared access to the kitchen, living room, and bathroom.

WHY STAY WITH TROVE?

⭐ Fast Communication
We’re always on call to answer your questions, typically within 30 minutes.

⭐ Experienced Hosts
We’ve hosted thousands of guests over five years.

⭐ Easy Self-Check-In
Keyless access means no keys for you manage during your stay!

⭐ Central Location
You’ll never be far from local spots to check out, sights to see, and public transit.

We’re located on the north side of Chicago in Lincoln Park, one of Chicago’s trendiest and safest neighborhoods. Our neighborhood is a wonderful mix of bustling streets packed with local restaurants and shops, as well as quiet tree-lined streets full of historic buildings. We’re also minutes away from many of Chicago’s most popular spots.

Because of our central location, we recommend leaving your car at home. Any point of interest in Chicago can easily be reached by walking, public transit, or Uber.

→ The Armitage Brown Line 'L' train station is next door.
→ O'Hare is 50 minutes away via public transit and 30-45 minutes away via Uber.
→ Midway is 60 minutes away via public transit and 35-50minutes away via Uber.

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

1. “How do I get to ‘x’ from the apartment?/How far is the apartment from ‘x’?”

Directions from our apartment to any point in the city are available via web search. We're next to the Armitage  'L' train station. Search for “Armitage Brown Line station Chicago” in Maps, click the “Directions” button, then enter your point of interest.

2. “Is there parking nearby?”

Parking in Chicago is often difficult and even more so in the evening and during special events. We recommend using a service called SpotHero because it allows you to reserve a nearby paid parking spot in advance so that you don’t have to worry about finding parking when you arrive.

3. When is check-in/check-out?

Check-in is 3 p.m. or later but you're welcome to stop by anytime after 11:30 a.m. to drop off your bags in the living room.

Check-out is at 11 a.m. Our cleaning staff will need access to the apartment at 11 a.m., but you’re welcome to leave your bags in the living room and pick them up by 2:30 p.m. at the latest.

4. “Can a third person stay in the room with me?”

We allow a maximum of two guests per room. We have additional rooms available if you need accommodations for more than two people. Send us a message for more info.

5. Will I have my own private bathroom?

The bathroom is shared with the other bedrooms.
house_rules: There is a chance you may not be our only Airbnb guest so we ask that you be mindful of anyone else who might be sharing the apartment with you. If you are watching TV in the evening, we ask that you keep the volume at a moderate level. Please no entertaining guests in the apartment after 11:00 pm. Per Airbnb policy, only guests booked through Airbnb can stay overnight with us.

additional_house_rules: IMPORTANT: When booking, please have a verified account with Airbnb. Our property is a great, quiet place to stay. You will absolutely sleep well at night....especially with no one above you. Responsible tenants live here.....also this is an owner occupied property. ABSOLUTELY NO... parties, bashes, or bachelor/bachelorette parties. We ask that everyone remain respectful during their stay. Please be considerate with late night activity and noise when leaving and entering the building between the hours of 10:00pm to 8:00am. Of course families are welcome, but for children under 5 years of age..... please contact us first. Upon contacting us, we look forward to talking with you briefly on your stay here with us whether by email....preferably by phone. Thanks

access: Your stay includes amenities like hairdryer, ironing board, towel rack, air mattress, wifi, cable tv, and complimentary coffee and tea. Guests have access to on site laundry in building. Bikes are available and provided for guests anytime. Plenty of free parking alongside building. Also, we have a great yard to read or just relax in. Feel free to use the community grill provided for guests. Of course, The Claremont is a non-smoking apartment. Feel free to smoke outside along parkway or in back in the yard patio area.
description:
The Claremont is a cozy and distinctive apartment set in a quiet Victorian era property. Located in "North Center"....we are close to the lake, bordering Lincoln Square, Ravenswood, and Roscoe Village. We are just a short walk to the Chicago Mosaic School, and the Brown Line train into downtown.

The Claremont is a newly listed, 2 bedroom, 1 bath apartment located in a traditional Victorian era building on a quiet residential street. The apartment has a cottage like feel with a wide open living room, and kitchen area. The apartment comes with many amenities and all the necessities you would come to expect in your visit. The Claremont has a loft appeal and receives plenty of sun during the day. Hardwood floors throughout, ceiling fans, a/c units (June 1-October 1) and Central heat system. Both bedrooms are on opposite sides of apartment for privacy. The Aragon bedroom comes with a plush, queen size mattress with plenty of closet space and hardwood floors. The North bedroom comes with a firm mattress and a small walk-in closet, and has hardwood floors throughout. Kitchen comes equipped with all appliances. (Dishwasher upon request) Living room has couch that converts to bed. Not a traditional sofa-couch sleeper.  Couch converts to a full size, firm surface,.... ideal for 1 person. There is an Intex brand air mattress in unit suitable for 1 person.....yes, the air mattress is surprisingly comfortable! Wifi available, and cable tv is provided. Laundry is on site. Bikes are on site and provided for guests. Free parking alongside building. Park your car and walk 12 feet to your door....literally! Also, we have a great yard to read or just relax in. Community grill provided for guests. The Claremont is a non-smoking apartment. Feel free to smoke outside along parkway or in the yard patio area.

Your stay includes amenities like hairdryer, ironing board, towel rack, air mattress, wifi, cable tv, and complimentary coffee and tea. Guests have access to on site laundry in building. Bikes are available and provided for guests anytime. Plenty of free parking alongside building. Also, we have a great yard to read or just relax in. Feel free to use the community grill provided for guests. Of course, The Claremont is a non-smoking apartment. Feel free to smoke outside along parkway or in back in the yard patio area.

This is an owner-occupied building. My sister and I will be available to help you with anything during your stay.  Please feel free to ask us for any recommendations we may have for you. It will be our pleasure to welcome you as guests and to have you leave as Chicagoans!

North Center is one of the most demanded and safest neighborhoods on the north side of Chicago. It is filled with farmers markets, boutique shops, pubs, coffee shops and possesses a great night life on and around Lincoln ave. Northcenter is well known for some of the best ethnic cuisine, great restaurants with outdoor eating, and year round festivals which are all walking distance from your stay. We are just steps away from Chicago's beloved Lincoln Ave, a short bike ride from Wrigley Field, and an easy 10 minute walk to the Irving Park Brown line train station into downtown.

The Claremont is walking accessible from Irving Park Rd, Lincoln Ave, and Western Ave. 
FROM O'HARE AIRPORT-    Take the Blue Line Train into the city, exit Irving Park Station. Take (80) Bus east to Western Ave. Exit bus walk 3 minutes to The Claremont. This is the best way to avoid rush hour traffic!
 IF BY CAR-       Plenty of parking available to guests along side building. Park your car walk 12 feet to your door. Yes, 12 feet!
TRAIN/SUBWAY/THE "EL"-      Walk to the Brown Line train in about a 10 minute walk past coffee shops, pubs and cafes along the way. The Brown Line train takes you through Lincoln Park on the way to the downtown area.
LAKEFRONT-    Take the Irving Park bus just 1 block away 15 minutes east to the lake. This is one of the nicest areas to walk, bike, and yes....golf on the lakefront.
WRIGLEYVILLE- We are close to Wrigley Field. Take Irving Park bus east 15 minutes to Clark St. or bike on over down Grace Street through the neighborhood 15 minutes to Wrigley Field. Wrigley Field offers bike valet which makes biking to the ball park the smartest way to commute.

North Center is a diverse and eclectic neighborhood that is clean, active with people out jogging or just dining at cafes. Northcenter is a safe neighborhood. Walking around at anytime during the day and night is recommended just to indulge in everything the neighborhood has to offer.
house_rules: IMPORTANT: When booking, please have a verified account with Airbnb. Our property is a great, quiet place to stay. You will absolutely sleep well at night....especially with no one above you. Responsible tenants live here.....also this is an owner occupied property. ABSOLUTELY NO... parties, bashes, or bachelor/bachelorette parties. We ask that everyone remain respectful during their stay. Please be considerate with late night activity and noise when leaving and entering the building between the hours of 10:00pm to 8:00am. Of course families are welcome, but for children under 5 years of age..... please contact us first. Upon contacting us, we look forward to talking with you briefly on your stay here with us whether by email....preferably by phone. Thanks

access: The guest will have private access to the suite, as well as shared access to our patio and backyard. They are welcome to use the gas grill.
description:
Our garden suite is the basement unit of our house that we own and occupy. Recently rehabbed with experience and quality of your stay in mind.

We created private, comfortable and practical space. Sleeping area features a full size bed (double) and a single person sleeper sofa. Single air mattress and child travel bed available. Please indicate if you need the sofa sleeper set up when booking.
Large living space with a couch. 
Private bright bathroom with shower (no tub) The kitchen is fully equipped with gas stove, microwave, refrigerator, toaster, coffee maker....We provide granola, yogurt, coffee and cream...

The guest will have private access to the suite, as well as shared access to our patio and backyard. They are welcome to use the gas grill.

We live on a property and try to check in guests directly, to introduce ourselves. We are accessible via phone and text as well as the app.

We are located in Jefferson Park. It is a quiet mostly residential neighborhood. Street parking is  plentiful. We’re walking distance to many restaurants, bakeries, grocery stores and an ethnic Eastern European Deli with ready made meals. 
We are about 10 minutes away from the O’Hare airport with uber or taxi. We are a few blocks away from blue line train coming from O’Hare. Our train stop is Jefferson Park, about 15 minutes walk to our house or take a bus that will stop about 100 feet from the house. 
Other things near us: Rosemont Convention Center, The Fashion Outlet of Chicago in Rosemont with many restaurants, movie theater, second city comedy club and more...

Near Blue Line train that will take you Downtown or to the O’Hare airport.
By car; we are near I-90.
Exits: Nagle from North/West  (from O’Hare)
Brynmawr from South/East (from Downtown)

As this is a garden unit, the ceiling joints are at about 6’ also the doorways are lower, and may be a concern for taller guests. You may hear walking around from our unit above. We have a large dog; her name is Yona and she is very friendly.

description:
Private, CLEAN, professionally designed room with 2 beds for 2 travelers who wish to sleep separately.  I provide FREE PARKING. You will have your own door code and may arrive at ANY time and as late as you wish, EASY self check-in guaranteed!

I allow LUGGAGE DROP OFF! You can store your luggage in the closet before check-in and after check-out times, you can drop it off and pick it up as early and as late as you would like.

The neighborhood is extremely quiet & safe

Restaurants and bars are right round the corner, both upscale and casual. This room is 6 minutes away by car or uber to Chicago's famous Willis (Sears) tower. Uber costs about $7. If you are arriving by car, I am providing free resident parking passes for anywhere in the area. (Yes, that means you can drive a few blocks and still park anywhere you want!)
The room will be ONLY yours for the time you'll stay in my Windy City. You will have a key to lock the door.

> 2 beds for 2 travelers who wish to sleep separately

> Free parking provided: park BEFORE your check-in and stay parked AFTER your check-out if you would like. You can park 2 cars!

> Apartment is NEWLY renovated and PROFESSIONALLY designed by an interior designer

> GREEN TEA & ALOE memory foam mattress

> Full-sized mirror in your room

> 5 MIN to DOWNTOWN

> Restaurants and bars are 5 MIN away walking distance

> 5 MIN walk to PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION/METRO

> 3 MIN walk to UIC (University of Illinois at Chicago)

> 15 MIN walk to Rush University & Hospital

> No security deposit

> Cancel up to 24 hours in advance to get a full refund

> Last minute reservations are welcome!

You will be given a door code to access the apartment and a key to lock your private room. You may arrive as late as you would like with my code entry. You may store your luggage in the closet BEFORE and AFTER check in so you don't have to haul your bags around the city. You will be able to view your check-in instructions under "House Manual" as soon as you confirm the booking. The door code will be sent to you 1 night prior to your arrival, or immediately if you have a last-minute booking. I will also be providing a binder full of recommendations to eat and go out from the local perspective, it will be on your bed upon arrival :)

100% of guests love my location- it is the best of both worlds: 5 minutes from the very center of downtown, yet quiet enough to not hear the noise at night. If you are still not convinced, please read my reviews.

"Racine" is the closest blue line train (metro) station, only 5 minutes away (walking). 
-Downtown/Loop: TO - take blue line towards O'Hare and get off at "LaSalle, Jackson, or Monroe," depending on where you are going :) FROM - take blue line towards Forest Park and get off at "Racine" About 5 minutes to downtown.
-O’Hare Airport: TO - take blue line towards O'Hare. O'Hare is the final stop. FROM - take blue line towards Forest Park and get off at "Racine" About 40 minutes to O’Hare.
-Midway Airport: TO - take blue line towards O'Hare and transfer to orange line at "Clark/Lake," then take orange line to towards Midway airport. Midway is the final stop! FROM - take orange line towards Adams/Wabash; then, transfer to blue line at "Clark/Lake." Take blue line towards Forest Park and get off at "Racine" About 45 minutes to Midway.
-Union Station/Amtrak: Only 20 minutes away (walking), taxi or uber will take you to the apartment in less than 5 minutes for about $6 :)
